WindowShowOpenFilePicker.summary:
The showOpenFilePicker() method of the
interface shows a file picker that allows a user to select a file
or multiple files and returns a handle for the file(s).

remarks.para:
-File System Access API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files

WindowShowOpenFilePicker.returns: A {{jsxref("Promise")}} whose fulfillment handler receives an {{jsxref('Array')}} of objects.
